alarms.comments: Power switch on, AC power not available,
Ventilator operating on BPS. BPS operating indicator turns on. Resets when AC power is restored.

alarms.analysisMessage: Apnea ventilation. Breath interval > apnea interval.
alarms.comments: The set apnea interval has elapsed without the ventilator, patient, or operator triggering a breath. Resets when patient initiates 2 consecutive breaths. Possible dependent alarm:  ↓VE TOT

alarms.analysisMessage: Extended apnea duration or multiple apnea events.
alarms.comments: The set apnea interval has elapsed without the ventilator, patient, or operator triggering a breath. Resets when patient initiates 2 consecutive breaths. Possible dependent alarm:  ↓VE TOT

Ventilator has recovered from unintended power loss lasting more than 5 minutes, detects circuit disconnect, switches to idle mode; upper screen displays elapsed time without ventilator support. Resets when ventilator senses reconnection.
Ventilator detects circuit disconnect and switches to idle mode; upper screen displays elapsed time without ventilator support. Resets when ventilator senses reconnection.

alarms.remedyMessage: Inspired volume may be < set. Check patient and circuit type.
alarms.comments: Compliance volume required to compensate delivery of a volume controlled breath exceeds the maximum allowed for 3 of the last 4 breaths.

alarms.analysisMessage: No compressor air. No operation during low AC power.
alarms.comments: Compressor ready indicator turns off. Resets when full AC power is restored.

alarms.analysisMessage: No compressor air. No operation during AC power loss.
alarms.comments: Ventilator turns off compressor. Resets when full AC power is restored.
Compressor ready indicator turns off.
Alarm occurs when there are no LOW AC POWER and no AC POWER LOSS alarms for < 15 seconds AND time since power-on > 10 seconds.
Background checks have detected a problem. Resets when ventilator passes EST.

alarms.analysisMessage: Breath delivery not affected. Compromised spirometry.
alarms.comments: POST has detected a problem. Resets when ventilator passes POST.

alarms.analysisMessage: Breath delivery not affected. Possible compromise of other functions.

alarms.comments: Background checks have detected a problem. Accuracy of exhalation flow sensor temperature may be affected. Resets when ventilator passes EST.
Background checks have detected a problem. Accuracy of oxygen flow sensor temperature may be affected, ventilator using nominal value. Resets when ventilator passes EST.

alarms.analysisMessage: Breath delivery not affected. Compromised spirometry.
alarms.comments: Background checks have detected a problem. Resets when ventilator passes EST.

alarms.analysisMessage: Ventilation continues as set. Only O2 available.
alarms.comments: Background checks have detected a problem. Ventilator delivers 100% O2. Resets when ventilator passes EST.

alarms.analysisMessage: Breath delivery not affected. Compromised spirometry.
alarms.comments: Background checks have detected a problem. Accuracy of exhalation flow sensor temperature may be affected. Resets when ventilator passes EST.

alarms.analysisMessage: Ventilation continues as set. Only air available.
alarms.comments: Background checks have detected a problem. Ventilator delivers 21% O2. Resets when ventilator passes EST.
Background checks have detected a problem. Loss of GUI indicator lights. Setting changes disabled. Resets when ventilator passes EST.

alarms.analysisMessage: Unable to determine status of breath delivery.
alarms.comments: Background checks have detected a problem. Loss of GUI indicator lights. Resets when communication between GUI and BDU is re-established.
Background checks have detected a problem. Loss of GUI indicator lights. Alarms, setting changes, and monitored data disabled. Resets when ventilator passes EST.
Background checks have detected a problem. Setting changes, monitored data, and alarms disabled. Resets when ventilator passes EST.

alarms.analysisMessage: Ventilation continues as set. Delivery/spiro may be compromised.
alarms.comments: Background checks have detected a problem. Setting changes not allowed. Resets when ventilator passes EST.

alarms.analysisMessage: Breath delivery not affected. Compromised spiro. Trig = pres.
alarms.comments: Background checks have detected a problem and flow triggering was selected. Accuracy of exhalation flow sensor temperature may be affected. Resets when ventilator passes EST.

alarms.analysisMessage: Ventilation continues as set, except O2% = 100.
alarms.comments: Background checks have detected a problem. Ventilator delivers 100% O2 instead of set O2%. Resets when ventilator passes EST.

alarms.analysisMessage: Ventilation continues as set. Compromised air delivery.
alarms.comments: Background checks have detected a problem. Accuracy of air flow sensor temperature may be affected, ventilator using nominal value. Resets when ventilator passes EST.

alarms.analysisMessage: Ventilation continues as set. Compromised O2 delivery.
alarms.comments: Background checks have detected a problem. Accuracy of oxygen flow sensor temperature may be affected, ventilator using nominal value. Resets when ventilator passes EST.

alarms.analysisMessage: Power loss & recovery occurred with a pre-existing Device Alert.
alarms.comments: Background checks have detected a problem. Loss of GUI indicator lights. Resets when ventilator passes EST.

alarms.analysisMessage: Ventilation continues as set, except O2% = 21.
alarms.comments: Background checks have detected a problem. Ventilator delivers 21% O2 % instead of set O2. Resets when ventilator passes EST.

alarms.remedyMessage: Provide alternate ventilation. Replace & service ventilator.
alarms.comments: Background checks have detected a problem. Safety valve open indicator lights. Upper screen displays elapsed time without ventilator support.
Background checks have detected a problem. Safety valve open indicator lights. Upper screen displays elapsed time without ventilator support.

alarms.remedyMessage: Provide alternate ventilation. Replace & service ventilator.
alarms.comments: Background checks have detected a problem. Ventilator inoperative and safety valve open indicators light. Message may not be visible. If possible, upper screen displays elapsed time without ventilator support. Resets when ventilator passes EST.
Measured airway pressure ≥ set limit.
Ventilator truncates current breath unless already in exhalation. Possible dependent alarms: ↓VTE MAND,  .        , . f ↓VE TOT  ↑ TOT

alarms.analysisMessage: Last 4 or more breaths ≥ set limit.
alarms.comments: Ventilator truncates current breath unless already in exhalation. Possible dependent alarms: ↓VTE MAND,  .        , . f ↓VE TOT  ↑ TOT
Peak inspiratory pressure ≤ set limit. (Available only when Vent Type is NIV or during INVASIVE ventilation when Mandatory Type is VC+.)
Peak inspiratory pressure ≤ set limit. (Available only when Vent Type is NIV or during INVASIVE ventilation when Mandatory Type is VC+.)

alarms.analysisMessage: Last 10 or more breaths, pressure ≤ set limit.
alarms.comments: Peak inspiratory pressure ≤ set limit. (Available only when Vent Type is NIV or during INVASIVE ventilation when Mandatory Type is VC+.)

alarms.analysisMessage: Measured % > set for 30 s but < 2 min.
alarms.remedyMessage: Check patient, gas sources, O2 analyzer & ventilator.
alarms.comments: The O2% measured during any phase of a breath cycle is 7% (12% during the first hour of operation) or more above the O2% setting for at least 30 seconds. (These percentages increase by 5% for 4 minutes following a decrease in the O2% setting.) Alarm updated at 1-second intervals.

alarms.remedyMessage: Check patient, gas sources, O2 analyzer & ventilator.
alarms.comments: The O2% measured during any phase of a breath cycle is 7% (12% during the first hour of operation) or more above the O2% setting for at least 30 seconds. (These percentages increase by 5% for 4 minutes following a decrease in the O2% setting.) Alarm updated at 1-second intervals.

alarms.remedyMessage: Check settings, changes in patient's R & C.
alarms.comments: Exhaled tidal volume ≥ set limit.

alarms.remedyMessage: Check settings, changes in patient's R & C.
alarms.comments: Alarm updated whenever exhaled tidal volume is recalculated.

alarms.analysisMessage: Last 10 or more breaths ≥ set limit.
alarms.remedyMessage: Check settings, changes in patient's R & C.
alarms.comments: Possible dependent alarm: ↑ .     . alarm: VE TOT
Expiratory minute volume ≥ set limit.
Alarm updated whenever an exhaled minute volume is recalculated.
Possible dependent alarm: ↑ VTE .

Total respiratory rate ≥ set limit. Alarm updated at the beginning of each inspiration. Reset when measured respiratory rate falls below the alarm limit. Possible dependent alarms: ↓VTE MAND, ↓VTE SPONT, .     . VE TOT

Total respiratory rate ≥ set limit. Alarm updated at the beginning of each inspiration. Reset when measured respiratory rate falls below the alarm limit. Possible dependent alarms: ↓VTE MAND, ↓VTE SPONT, .     . VE TOT

Total respiratory rate ≥ set limit. Alarm updated at the beginning of each inspiration. Reset when measured respiratory rate falls below the alarm limit. Possible dependent alarms: ↓VTE MAND, ↓VTE SPONT, .     . VE TOT
Inspiratory pressure > 100 cmH2O and mandatory type = VC or spontaneous type = TC or PA.
Inspiratory pressure > 100 cmH2O and mandatory type = VC or spontaneous type = TC or PA.

Inspiratory pressure > 100 cmH2O and mandatory type = VC or spontaneous type = TC or PA. Ventilator truncates current breath unless already in exhalation. Possible dependent alarms: ↓V         , .    TE MANDf V        , . ↓ E TOT  ↑ TOT

alarms.analysisMessage: Inadequate charge or non-functional battery system.
alarms.comments: BPS installed but not functioning. Resets when BPS is functional.

alarms.analysisMessage: Last 2 spont breaths = IBW based TI limit.
alarms.comments: Inspiratory time for spontaneous breath ≥ IBW-based limit.

alarms.analysisMessage: Last 4 spont breaths = IBW based TI limit.
alarms.comments: Ventilator transitions to exhalation. Resets when TI falls below IBW-based limit.

alarms.analysisMessage: Last 10 or more spont breaths = IBW based TI limit.
alarms.comments: Active only when Vent Type is INVASIVE.

The ventilator power switch is on and there is insufficient power from AC and the BPS (if installed). There may not be a visual indicator for this alarm, but an independent audio alarm on the BDU sounds for at least 120 seconds. Alarm annunciation can be reset by turning power switch to off position.
Mains (AC) power has dropped below 80% of nominal for 1 second. Ventilator continues operation as close to settings as possible. Resets when there is no low AC power signal for 1 second.
Resets when BPS has more than approximately 2 minutes of operational time remaining.

alarms.remedyMessage: Check patient, gas sources, O2 analyzer & ventilator.
alarms.comments: The O2% measured during any phase of a breath cycle is 7% (12% during the first hour of operation) or more below the O2% setting for at least 30 seconds, or below 18%. (These percentages increase by 5% for 4 minutes following an increase in the O2% setting.) Alarm updated at 1-second intervals.

alarms.remedyMessage: Check for leaks, changes in patient's R & C.
alarms.comments: Exhaled mandatory tidal volume ≤ set limit. Alarm updated whenever exhaled mandatory tidal volume is recalculated.

alarms.remedyMessage: Check for leaks, changes in patient's R & C.
alarms.comments: Exhaled mandatory tidal volume ≤ set limit. Alarm updated whenever exhaled mandatory tidal volume is recalculated.

alarms.analysisMessage: Last 10 or more mand. breaths ≤ set limit.
alarms.remedyMessage: Check for leaks, changes in patient's R & C.
alarms.comments: Possible dependent alarms: ↑ .     , . VE TOT    ↑ fTOT
Exhaled spontaneous tidal volume ≤ set limit.
Alarm updated whenever exhaled spontaneous tidal volume is recalculated.

alarms.analysisMessage: Last 10 or more spont breaths ≤ set limit.
alarms.comments: Possible dependent alarms: .        , . f ↓VE TOT   ↑ TOT
Total minute volume ≤ set limit. Alarm updated whenever exhaled minute volume is recalculated.
Alarm updated whenever exhaled minute volume is recalculated.
Possible dependent alarms: ↓V         , TE MAND ↓VTE SPONT, ↑fTOT .

alarms.analysisMessage: Ventilation continues as set. Only O2 available.
alarms.comments: Operator-set O2% equals 100%. Resets if air supply connected.

alarms.analysisMessage: Compressor inoperative. Ventilation continues as set. Only O2 available.
Ventilation continues as set except O2% = 100.
alarms.comments: Operator-set O2% < 100%. Ventilator delivers 100% O2 instead of set O2%.

alarms.analysisMessage: Compressor inoperative. Ventilation continues as set, except O2% = 100.
alarms.comments: Resets if air supply connected.

alarms.baseMessage: NO AIR SUPPLY and NO O2 SUPPLY
alarms.remedyMessage: Provide alternate ventilation. Check both gas sources.
alarms.comments: Safety valve open indicator lights. Upper screen displays elapsed time without ventilator support. Safety valve closes and indicator turns off if either gas supply is connected. Individual gas supply alarm resets when corresponding supply is connected.

alarms.analysisMessage: Ventilation continues as set. Only air available.
alarms.comments: Operator-set O2% equals 21%. Resets if O2 supply connected.

alarms.analysisMessage: Ventilation continues as set, except O2% = 21.
alarms.comments: Operator-set O2% > 21%. Ventilator delivers 21% O2 instead of set O2%. Resets if oxygen supply connected.

alarms.remedyMessage: O2 sensor out of calibration/failure. Press 100% O2 CAL, replace or disable.
alarms.comments: Background checks have detected a problem. Resets when operator successfully calibrates oxygen sensor, or disables oxygen sensor.

alarms.remedyMessage: Provide alternate ventilation. Complete setup process.
alarms.comments: Ventilator begins safety ventilation. Resets when ventilator startup procedure is complete.

alarms.analysisMessage: Possible blocked beam or touch screen fault.
alarms.comments: Background checks have detected a problem. Resets when ventilator passes EST or when blockage is removed.

alarms.remedyMessage: Check patient. Provide alternate ventilation. Clear occlusions; drain circuit.
alarms.comments: Ventilator enters occlusion status cycling (OSC) and upper screen displays elapsed time without ventilator support.
